title: The louers melancholy Acted at the Priuate House in the Blacke Friers, and publikely at the Globe by the Kings Maiesties Seruants.
author: Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed [by Felix Kingston] for H. Seile, and are to be sold at the Tygers head in Saint Pauls Church-yard,
